description: Awaiting Certification - Provides statistics on the Redis database server

paramSchema.title: Redis Hostname
paramSchema.name: redis_hostname
paramSchema.description: Redis server to connect to (defaults to localhost)

paramSchema.title: Redis Port
paramSchema.name: redis_port
paramSchema.description: Port to connect to Redis on (defaults to 6379)

paramSchema.title: Redis Password
paramSchema.name: redis_password
paramSchema.description: Password to authenticate Redis with (defaults to none)

paramSchema.title: Poll Time (sec)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often to collect metrics from the Redis instance
